attributes.action: stop council tax charges for the over sixtys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The over sixtys should not pay council tax, it is a burden on their standard of living.Any help is means tested which is of no help to those who have worked and tried to save during their working lives.So much of tax payers money is going abroad to help other countries and people here in england are having to go without, i here there is suppose to be enough for everyone, in that case let us have it, we are denied a decent state pension,againist the rest of the eu countries plus ministers are spending tax payers money on expensive evenings on entertaining with food and drink discussing the credit crunch, in one case at a cost of £60,000 for one evening.So much money is wasted by the goverment this needs to be stopped.
